name: 50 Cent: BotS
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB)  The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, German.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".   Play as 50 Cent, the world's biggest hip-hop star, in this fast-paced action shooter! You and the G-Unit will battle across two war-torn countries to collect your payday and exact your revenge on those who have crossed you.
